body: The MC had an arranged marriage to Glasses girl who agreed because MC looked like his big bro(im assuming it his big bro) FMC was probs the MCs dad love child hence the kiss and grave visit
Damn the first story was good. Glad they got together in the end

The last girl in the story is a virgin so there should be a defloration tag. Imouto beat her onee-chan to be a woman. She's been doing it with fatso for a long time while onee-chan stayed a virgin until she discovered the truth.

So she left pregnant with her big bro's child and live at the outskirts of the country to be not found but after 5 yrs she they got found. Big bro's arranged wife on the other hand has a lover whom she loves so she understand big bro's situation and they eloped with the help of big bro stopping his former wife's father.
